titleStmt.title: A pleasant ditty, of a maydens vow, that faine would marry, and yet knew not how To the tune of O no, no, no, not yet.

notesStmt.note: Printer's and publisher's names and suggested publication date from STC.
"The wofull complaint of a loue-sicke mayde" (STC 5612) printed on verso.
Verse - "There was a lusty youthfull lad,".
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
